## 1 Oct 2023
{: #network-latency-2023-10-01}

### Inter-region latency
{: #network-latency-2023-10-01-mzr}

| Average latency (ms) | Dallas | Toronto | Washington DC | Frankfurt | London | Madrid | Osaka | Sydney | Tokyo | Sao Paulo |
| --- | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: |
| **Dallas** |   | 33 | 32 | 122 | 112 | 115 | 150 | 186 | 142 | 147 |
| **Toronto** |  33 |  | 19 | 93 | 82 | 104 | 154 | 215 | 148 | 133 |
| **Washington DC** |  31 | 19 |  | 93 | 75 | 85 | 162 | 213 | 153 | 120 |
| **Frankfurt** |  122 | 92 | 94 |  | 12 | 29 | 240 | 247 | 235 | 198 |
| **London** |  112 | 81 | 75 | 12 |  | 28 | 252 | 259 | 246 | 187 |
| **Madrid** |  119 | 106 | 89 | 29 | 28 |  | 266 | 272 | 260 | 206 |
| **Osaka** |  149 | 157 | 161 | 241 | 253 | 268 |  | 124 | 9 | 294 |
| **Sydney** |  186 | 214 | 216 | 248 | 258 | 275 | 135 |  | 131 | 331 |
| **Tokyo** |  144 | 149 | 154 | 233 | 247 | 260 | 9 | 118 |  | 290 |
| **Sao Paulo** |  146 | 131 | 119 | 200 | 189 | 211 | 296 | 330 | 290 |  |
{: caption="Table 45. 2 Sep 2023–1 Oct 2023" caption-side="bottom"}
